summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest, from Manning Street to Avalon Way, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9733 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
